publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2618 Hugh O’Donnell: Eid Mubarak—That the Parliament sends warm greetings to Muslims across Scotland and around the world for the festival of Eid al-Fitr; joins them in honouring the promise of harmony, peace, health and prosperity enshrined in Eid al-Fitr; looks forward to religious diversity and freedom in all countries, and recognises the contribution of Muslim Scots to Scottish life and culture. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-2618 Eid Mubarak (lodged on 29 September 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2618 Eid Mubarak (lodged on 29 September 2008) Jack McConnell*

S3M-2618 Eid Mubarak (lodged on 29 September 2008) Jamie McGrigor*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Stuart McMillan*, David Whitton*, Keith Brown*, Mike Pringle*, Nanette Milne*, Sandra White*, Murdo Fraser*, Bob Doris*, Mr Frank McAveety*, David Stewart*, Gil Paterson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Alasdair Allan*, Jim Tolson*, Bill Kidd*, Brian Adam*, Ross Finnie*

S3M-2618 Hugh O’Donnell: Eid Mubarak—That the Parliament sends warm greetings to Muslims across Scotland and around the world for the festival of Eid al-Fitr; joins them in honouring the promise of harmony, peace, health and prosperity enshrined in Eid al-Fitr; looks forward to religious diversity and freedom in all countries, and recognises the contribution of Muslim Scots to Scottish life and culture. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell, Jamie McGrigor, Joe FitzPatrick, Stuart McMillan, David Whitton, Keith Brown, Mike Pringle, Nanette Milne, Sandra White, Murdo Fraser, Bob Doris, Mr Frank McAveety, David Stewart, Gil Paterson, Bashir Ahmad, Alasdair Allan, Jim Tolson, Bill Kidd, Brian Adam, Ross Finnie, Robin Harper*, Hugh Henry*, Rob Gibson*, Ken Macintosh*, Angela Constance*, Michael Matheson*, Elaine Smith*, Aileen Campbell*
S3M-2618 Eid Mubarak (lodged on 29 September 2008) Dave Thompson*, Pauline McNeill*
S3M-2618 Eid Mubarak (lodged on 29 September 2008) Cathy Jamieson*
S3M-2618 Eid Mubarak (lodged on 29 September 2008) Cathy Peattie*
